Text: your work is supreme...i wish i learned languages at school.
:) well, You can begin now! :) You're welcome, my friend!

haha....i do speak spanish and am learning swedish as i will be living there next year.I guess german and russiian were not top of my list.People like you are very rare;this community is something that is out of control of governments and tv networks,and thats why they hate it.All over the world we wait and wait for u guys to do this;that to me is delicious.People who never meet but trust....thank you sir/madam.
Thank you for your great words, my friend! English, spanish and swedish is quite good. I speak 4 languages too. I don't know if I am a sir, but definitely I'm not a madam :) Cheers, my friend!
